definition: to complain/to grumble/to harbor a complaint/to feel dissatisfied
to resent/to harbor a grudge against/to loathe/resentment/rancor
lit. cries of complaint fill the roads (idiom); complaints rise all around/discontent is openly voiced
(idiom) to blame the gods and accuse others
an old grudge/old scores to settle

sentences.english: All right, do it your own way, but dont blame me if you fail.
sentences.chinese: 就按你的辦法去做吧，行不通可別怨我。

sentences.english: God bless you. And may God bless the United States of America.
sentences.chinese: 天主保佑你們，怨亓保佑美利堅合衆國。

sentences.english: Some back how ability hatred society?
Is d. give a intersection, blame the humble dirty gown.
sentences.chinese: 正婷羞怒交集，怨一介弄髒晚裝。

sentences.english: She regrets not having taken my advice.
sentences.chinese: 她悔怨沒有聽我的提議。

sentences.english: Where is I dwell place can peaceful my heart lung , empty stomach in full hate .
sentences.chinese: 何處是吾棲身處可安吾心腑，滿腔空腹怨。

sentences.english: Many complain of their memory, fewer of their judgement.
sentences.chinese: 怨記憶力差的人多，恨判斷力弱的人少。

sentences.english: I do not blame reality, I only blame you without stopping to look at me.
sentences.chinese: 我不怨現實，怨的只是妳沒有停畱下來看望我一下。

sentences.english: He is always complaining about the weather.
The grandpa's few words wiped away decades of resentment.
sentences.chinese: 阿公輕輕一句話，把所有幾十年的怨都抹消掉了。

sentences.english: I've got no time sitting here listen to your boo-hooling.
sentences.chinese: 我可沒時間坐這兒聽你怨這怨那。

sentences.english: It was all because of the middle name "stupid" my mother gave me.
sentences.chinese: 都怨俺媽給俺起的小名“周笨馳”中間這個字。

sentences.english: Burton died in 1984 of a brain hemorrhage. He was 58.
sentences.chinese: 理查怨正在1984年生於腦溢血，生時58歲。

definition: Ai (c. 2000 BC), sixth of legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God, also known as Li 釐|厘[Li2]
sorrow/grief/pity/to grieve for/to pity/to lament/to condole
to resent/to harbor a grudge against/to loathe/resentment/rancor
to pay back a score/to get revenge/to requite/(old) variant of 抱怨[bao4 yuan4]
